#summary Logging example

The following snippets should the log4j output from the router when using the stateless router implementation from the examples.  The first example shows the router attempting to find a route for `atlanta.com`:

{{{

Via: SIP/2.0/UDP 127.0.0.1:5062;rport=5062;branch=z9hG4bKjfifvyov;received=127.0.0.1
Max-Forwards: 70
To: "Dave" <sip:alice@atlanta.com>
From: "Dave" <sip:alice@atlanta.com>;tag=gewqv
Call-ID: hjccavlujocnswe@dgrant-desktop
CSeq: 953 REGISTER
Contact: <sip:alice@127.0.0.1:5062>;expires=3600
Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,PRACK,REFER,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE
User-Agent: Twinkle/1.4.2
Content-Length: 0
